column1: Uchi////When we got to the hostess stand
column2: they were giggling and what-not and no one even said Happy Anniversary. Ever. Not one server
column4: no one. At Uchi Austin when it was my birthday
column5: I was greeted 3 times. Did I expect too much? I don't know but most restaurants give a dessert
column7: or a glass of wine/champagne for any celebration.
